amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 116-383 to amend the date for relief on major disaster and emergency declarations to begin on the initial date of the incident period of the major disaster or emergency.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 116-383 to amend the date for relief on major disaster and emergency declarations to begin on the initial date of the incident period of the major disaster or emergency.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. King (IA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
